titleStmt.title: The restauration of the Jevves: or, a true relation of their progress and proceedings in order to the regaining of their ancient kingdom. Being the substance of several letters viz. from Antwerp, Legorn, Florence, &c. Published by R.R.
titleStmt.author: R. R.

notesStmt.note: "Antwerp, Legorn, Florence, &c." are in brackets on title page.
